title: Bookjacket, "Bookjacket for "The Playwright as Thinker" by Eric Bentley", 1955
medium: Lithography in green, pink, black and white ink on white shiny wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted on cover vertically in black ink at lower right in script: lustig
On the top haft of the cover in white, black and pink: THE [pink]/ PLAYWRITE [pink]/ AS [white]/ THINKER [pink]/ A study of modern theatre by [black]/ ERIC BENTLEY [white]
Across the bottom in white and black: MERIDIAN BOOKS [white] published by The Noonday Press/ M6 $1.25 [black]
creditline: Gift of Tamar Cohen and Dave Slatoff
description: The bookjacket has a green background. The title, author and publisher's names are written vertically down the spine. On the back cover are the title, author's name, synopsis, and reviews of the book. Produced for Meridian Press.
